title: Ideas of names for a Thresh main?
body: I have mained Thresh for a while now and I changed my name to my current one recently, although it is a name that I think is suiting for a Thresh main I think some people don't get it. I know this has been asked before but I am looking for something Thresh and New ( xd ) to use for a name. Thanks in advance :)

replies.body:
TheThreshPrince
Green Lantern
Youre Hooked
Get Hooked
Im Hooked
Thresh Express
BreathOfThreshAir
ThreshAsADaisy
Mad Wife
.....and now im Thresh out of ideas , but srsly if you want something generic but not really that unique google is the answer ;)  Lots of good ones out there but for it to be available is another thing.  anywho GL on your search

every fucking thresh main and their mother have a thresh related name. just dont. its beyond annoying to look at and i bet you probably have a clan tag called 'FL4Y' or something along those lines. just make a name that is unique to you, something you can be represented under.

> [{quoted}](name=hentai cutie pie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=bpy9zZVk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-26T10:58:45.208+0000)
>
> every fucking thresh main and their mother have a thresh related name. just dont. its beyond annoying to look at and i bet you probably have a clan tag called 'FL4Y' or something along those lines. just make a name that is unique to you, something you can be represented under.

Close, it's Hook™ 

That's probably because Thresh is one of the most mained supports in the game.

and interestingly enough people will more likely remember a unique name over a generic thresh name when they think of this thresh that is a beast. do what you want though. i'd suggest a non edgy type of name.

> [{quoted}](name=hentai cutie pie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=bpy9zZVk,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-26T11:26:37.091+0000)
>
> and interestingly enough people will more likely remember a unique name over a generic thresh name when they think of this thresh that is a beast. do what you want though. i'd suggest a non edgy type of name.

I get what you are saying but it's sometimes difficult to have a unique name to go by.

Definitely Not Blitzcrank.
Definitely Not Thresh.
Definitely Not Nautilus.
Definitely Not Pudge.
First Time Thresh.
Click The Lantern...
Bronze Thresh.
Green Lantern.
Threshalicious.

I could go on for days.
